title: Devil's Doll / The Devil's Hand (1961) by William J. Hole Jr. | Horror Movie | Colorized

sources.title: Devil's Doll / The Devil's Hand (1961) by William J. Hole Jr. | Horror Movie | Colorized
sources.description:
Diabolical Dance with The Devil's Hand. 
Rick is plagued by visions of a beautiful woman. His distress deepens when he discovers a doll bearing a striking resemblance to his fianc√©e. When he finally meets the woman of his visions, she lures him into a cult devoted to the worship of the malevolent Gamba. Is this the beginning of the end?

Original title: The Devil's Hand (1961) AKA: Devil's Doll / Witchcraft
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/Vy_wU6xh-2k


Director: William J. Hole Jr.
Writer: Jo Heims 
Stars: Linda Christian, Robert Alda, Ariadne Welter 
Genres: Colorized classics, Cult Film, Horror


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:44 A mysterious encounter leads to confusion and suspicion during a meeting with a doll maker.
06:32 Mysterious events unfold as a man receives a doll unexpectedly, leading to confusion and suspense.
11:33 A mysterious encounter leads to a quest for truth involving a doll and a painting.
15:36 A mysterious encounter leads to a discussion about dreams and mind control during a dinner party.
20:51 Mysterious cult worships demon Gamba, seeking control over destiny through rituals and sacrifices.
30:03 A mysterious ritual involving a sacrifice to a deity named Gamba unfolds with intense suspense and secrecy.
38:46 Mysterious conversation between Rick and Bianca reveals hidden truths and fears.
41:39 A mysterious and suspenseful plot unfolds involving a woman, a man, and a doll, leading to a potential threat and a decision to be made.
48:00 Mysterious events unfold as a group is threatened by a betrayal, leading to a deadly confrontation.
58:44 A young girl becomes a sacrificial victim in a ritual to prove loyalty and dispel doubts.
1:06:34 A tale of betrayal, loyalty, and danger unfolds as characters navigate through a dark and suspenseful situation.
